author: Lon.TV
description:
Watch and Buy On Amazon: https://lon.tv/tj5vz (compensated affiliate link) - The Atari VCS was/is Atari's attempt at a modern console with its own game and app ecosystem. But  it's also an AMD powered Mini PC capable of running Windows and Linux. Subscribe for more!  https://lon.tv/s

title: Live: Unboxing and Testing the Atari VCS!
